title.value: Влияние различных йодсодержащих препаратов на естественную резистентность сухостойных коров
Effect of various iodine-containing preparations on the natural resistance of dry cows

journal.title: Zootechnical Science of Belarus: collection of scientific papers

person.name: Pochkina, S.N., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The studies helped to determine that the use of different iodine-containing preparations in diets for dry cows had a positive effect on the natural resistance and clinical blood parameters. The greatest positive effect was obtained when preparation with organic iodine Monklavit-1 was used. Bactericidal activity of blood whey (BABW) of the cows received iodomarin in addition to the basic diet, in the end of experience has increased on 4,2% (P0,01), and at animals to which in addition gave the Monklavit-1, the given parameter was above the control over 4,1% (P0,01). At animals which in addition fed iodide potassium, the BABW was above the control over 0,6%, though and without an authentic difference. Lysozymic activity of blood whey (LABW) in the end of experience at cows of 2 group was on 4,6% (P0,05), and at cows of 3 group on 5,0% (P0,05) above, than at analogues  of 1 control group. Phagocytal activity of leukocytes in the end of experience was above at cows skilled groups in relation to the control over 0,6%, 0,3 and 0,1%, accordingly
